# Specifications

These specifications define the design and behavior of Basic Memory Hooks.

| Spec | Description |
|------|-------------|
| [SPEC-0: How to Write Specs](SPEC-0-how-to-write-specs.md) | Meta-spec: how to write specifications |
| [SPEC-1: Configuration Schema](SPEC-1-configuration-schema.md) | The `.basic-memory/format.md` configuration format |
| [SPEC-2: Hook System Interface](SPEC-2-hook-system-interface.md) | Python hook interface and execution model |
| [SPEC-3: Validation API](SPEC-3-validation-api.md) | HTTP API for validation |

## Spec Format

Each spec follows a consistent structure:

- **Why** - The problem being solved
- **What** - What the solution provides
- **How (High Level)** - Implementation details
- **How to Evaluate** - Success criteria and test cases
